Title: The Good Earth

Description: Directed by Sidney Franklin, Victor Fleming, Gustav Machatý.  With Paul Muni, Luise Rainer, Walter Connolly, Tilly Losch. The story of a farmer in China: a story of humility and bravery. His father gives Wang Lung a freed slave as wife. By diligence and frugality the two manage to enlarge their property. But then a famine forces them to leave their land and live in the town. However it turns out to be a blessing in disguise for them...
